transcript:
Customer: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Ji Narendra ji se baat kariye na.
Executive: Industries.
Customer: Haan ji bhai sahab. Haan sir ji good evening mera naam Saransh hai business manager baat karna tha office se baat kar raha hun.
Customer: Batao bolo bhai sahab.
Executive: Sir ji inquiry aap logon ki generate hui hai mere pass jahan par request aaya hai ki aap na Ankit Jain karke koi account manager hai.
Customer: Bhai sahab haan ab theek hai ab meri baat sun lo Ankit Jain hi mere ko account manager chahiye uske alava aap mera paisa refund kar do mujhe kuch nahi chahiye IndiaMART se.
Executive: Sir aapko baat karne chahiye.
Customer: Haan sir baat karenge to at least uska conclusion nikal paunga na main aapke liye.
Customer: Haan bolo conclusion bhai sahab mere pass time nahi hai itna bar bar.
Executive: Aapke pass time nahi hai sir time kisi ke pass bhi nahi hota kam important hai to aapka kam karna hai isiliye aapko call kiya ja raha hai.
Customer: Haan haan bolo sir short mein bol do thoda sa.
Executive: Main short mein bas ye bata raha tha ki maine aaj hamare jo HOD hai floor ke right unko dono cheeze bheji hai ek bheja hai ki sir ya to refund karaiye ya Ankit Jain assign karaiye right to unhone NLD team ke pass request bheji hui hai jisse aapka catalog.
Customer: Theek hai sir dhanyavad hai aapka.
Executive: To jaise hi jaise hi hamare pass agar approval aayega usse assign karne ka to hum aapka catalog usse assign kar denge right otherwise aapka refund ka request kar diya hai ki wo refund ho jayega suniye suniye suniye in case agar refund ho raha hoga right to ho sakta hai mere senior ki call aapke pass aayegi for the confirmation right.
Customer: Senior ki aaye main to saaf bata raha hun senior ki aaye junior ki aaye chahe malik ki aaye mere ko account manager chahiye Ankit Jain uske alava agar koi dusra banda aata hai mujhe mera paisa chahiye baad mein.
Executive: Aapki inquiry aapki inquiry ko bas sir main aapko bas ek chhoti si cheez bataunga ki aap Ankit Jain ko account manager chahte hain.
Customer: Bhai sahab wo genuine person hai ek call pe meri baat sunta hai raat ko 12 baje bhi phone karta hun na tab meri baat.
Executive: Achcha achcha matlab aapka kuch relation hai matlab aap jante ho achche se koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Achchi tarah janta hun achchi tarah parkha hua aadmi hun bhai sahab aap to Rajasthan ja ke usko phone karaya ki raat ko 12 baje maine usko yu phone kara ki bhaiya ye dekhna mere ko inquiry batana mere ko kaise kya hai aise kisko kaise karun us aadmi ne raat ko 12 baje mera kam kiya hai to main Ankit Jain ko kyun nahi lun.
Executive: Nahi definitely aapne agar aisa account manager aapko milta hai aur aapko help karta hai to aapka hak banta hai usse lena agar aapke pass.
Customer: To isiliye mere ko Ankit Jain hi chahiye otherwise baad mein jaye IndiaMART mere ko chahiye.
Executive: Aur ye aapko catalog diya kisne tha Ankit Jain ne diya hai ye bhi.
Customer: Kaun sa catalog?
Executive: Ye jo paid subscription liya aapne Ankit Jain.
Customer: Catalog to mera bana tha Ankit Jain mere piche banaya tha Ankit Jain kaun hota hai catalog banane wala.
Executive: To ye catalog matlab aapne kisi se to liya hoga na kisi condition.
Customer: Banaya kisi se wo koi aapke IndiaMART se madam ka phone aaya tha usne banwaya IndiaMART se.
Executive: To usse aapne bataya tha ki mujhe Ankit Jain account manager chahiye.
Customer: Bhai sahab jab plan liya tha na usse pehle bataya tha Harish Soni ko.
Executive: Achcha bataya tha pehle se.
Customer: Haan ek isi shart pe maine plan liya hai nahi mere ko jarurat nahi hai IndiaMART ki bhai sahab offline bahut dhandha hai mere pass mere pass 10 factory chalti hai meri.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai to main ek kam kar raha hun main aage request forward kar diya hun.
Customer: Haan request dal do nahi to paisa dal do baat khatam bol do IndiaMART.
Executive: Naraz hone ki jarurat nahi hai sir ji.
Customer: Sir main to bilkul bahut buri tarah se naraz hun IndiaMART se.
Executive: Kyun naraz hue aap ye batao.
Customer: Bas mere ko Ankit Jain chahiye bas baat khatam.
Executive: Ankit Jain dekho ya to Ankit Jain milega ya paise milega.
Customer: Haan nahi mere ko mera paisa chahiye bhai sahab ek hi baat hai kuch chahiye hi nahi kuen mein pad jaye IndiaMART.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Haan bhai sahab main char saal se IndiaMART chala raha hun Anamika page just aap utha ke dekh lo.
Executive: Nahi nahi main dekh sakta hun mujhe pata hai.
Customer: Already meri company chalti hai to mere ko wo nahi chahiye mere ko aadmi chahiye paiso se value nahi hai sir bhai sahab mere ko.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Ankit Jain aayega to main export license export wo bhi lunga agar Ankit Jain nahi aayega to main kuch nahi lunga.
Executive: Chalenge aap export ko.
Customer: Export ka plan bhi.
Executive: Achcha export wala hai na.
Customer: Haan agar Ankit Jain nahi aayega to main IndiaMART ke hath hi nahi lagaunga mera paisa chahiye mujhe.
Executive: Theek hai sir main kar dunga.
Customer: Theek hai sir mere liye feedback aayega sir ek feedback.
Executive: Harish Soni se meri yahi baat hui thi bade bhaiya ki mere ko Ankit Jain account manager milega to hi main IndiaMART ka plan lunga nahi mere ko chahiye IndiaMART.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Haan isliye baat hui thi.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Sir ek request hai mera feedback aayega aap wo share kar dena main aage update kar dunga.
Customer: Koi dikkat nahi hai dhanyavad bhaiya haan.
Executive: Thank you sir ji.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants Ankit Jain as account manager.

- Wants refund if Ankit Jain is not assigned.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to forward the request.

- Informed about senior's call for refund confirmation.



Next Steps: 

- Feedback form to be shared with customer.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, account manager, catalog, export plan
